text: María Botto Rota (born 10 February 1974) is an Argentine-Spanish actress. In 1978, she moved to Spain with her mother Cristina Rota and her brother Juan Diego Botto, also actors. She also has other sister Nur Al Levi, also actress. She has appeared in more than thirty films since 1984. Since 2016, she has portrayed the recurring role of Juan Diego Botto's character Javier's sister, Ava Pereira, on the TNT drama series Good Behavior. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
